title: Exhibitions of China's intangible cultural heritage at CIIE show charm of Chinese culture
content: Gao Qinghai (C), an inheritor of intangible cultural heritage, introduces the skills of homespun cloth making from Weixian County, Hebei Province, during the third China International Import Expo (CIIE) in Shanghai, east China, Nov. 8, 2020. The exhibitions of China's intangible cultural heritage at the third CIIE has shown the charm of Chinese culture to exhibitors from all over the world. While promoting economic and trade cooperation, cultural exchanges have also been strengthened here. (Xinhua/Wang Jianhua)
